indicator_name: Number of fishing boats and artisan-fishing boats (smaller boats and gear) active in Barcelona
graph_title: Number of fishing boats and artisan-fishing boats (smaller boats and gear) active in Barcelona
barcelona_target: By 2030, promote the maintenance of the fishing sector in Barcelona, placing value on their economic, environmental and cultural contributions
national_indicator_available: Number of fishing boats and artisan-fishing boats (smaller boats and gear) active in Barcelona
target_line_2030: Maintain the number of fishing boats and more specifically the fishing boats using traditional techniques in Barcelona: 37 active boats, of which at least two use traditional gear
target_name: Facilitate the access of small-scale traditional fishermen to marine resources and markets
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 894kB)
